attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Name Mothers who stop contact with fathers for no reason.As a father i am fed up with mothers who stop contact when it suits them.As this government is willing to name fathers who do not pay money for their children to the mother,CSA or anyone else,why not shame mothers the same way.They are stopping contact with fathers who love their children.NAME AND SHAME those mothers because time with your kids  is more importent than money

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for government action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
